segments.text: I'm shocked by how unaware everyone seems in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, water cascading down like a fountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't even glanced at it while polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration is intense, towel bunched up around the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing at her feetâ€”how has she not slipped yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my attention, there's a boy on a stool by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar, balancing a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, looking ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby has her hand up, expecting her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this sneak so quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, unaware of the indoor drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes wait innocently by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a unexpected chain of events here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't see that coming at all.
segments.speaker: PAR
